definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: dub., perhaps rob (syn. [[גזל]], so Rabb. (rare), v. De:Pr 22:23);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. consec. [[וְקָכַע]] Pr 22:23, subj. ´[[י]]:, c. acc. pers. + rei; c. acc. pers alone 1 pl. [[כַּמֶּה קְבַעֲנוּךָ]] Mal 3:8 (obj. ´[[י]]:); Impf. 3 ms. [[הֲיִקְבַּע אָדָם אֱלֽהִים]] v:Mal 3:8; Pt. act. [[אַתֶּם קׂבְעִים אׂתִי]] v:Mal 3:8, v:Mal 3:9; sf. [[קׂבְעֵיהֶם]] Pr 22:23 those robbing them.—In Mal LXX We [[עָקַב]] circumvent.
